subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Basketball leaders, including N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and the N.C.A.A.’s president, Myles Brand, met to discuss ways to improve youth basketball beyond the sport’s diminishing quality of play.
snippet: Basketball leaders, including N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and the N.C.A.A.’s president, Myles Brand, met to discuss ways to improve youth basketball beyond the sport’s diminishing quality of play.
